name: Seth Kibel
title: Show Host
bio: Hey listeners! I’m Seth, and this is my second year with RawTalk! I’m currently a third year medical student at the University of Toronto, as well as a part-time researcher at Princess Margaret Hospital where I’m studying how we can use the immune system to fight cancer. Outside of school, I spend my time watching basketball, playing guitar, and trying to find the city’s best restaurants.
